FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions





Q-How to change my profile information? 
 A: Tap 'MESSAGE US' or email to inform us.

 Q:How to delete my account?
 A:Tap 'MESSAGE US' or email us for the same

 Q:Are we on other platforms like IOS,MacOS?
 A:No. Not as of now.

 Q:Do we have social media pages?
 A:Yes, look for the Instagram button at the top of home page.

 Q:What is our Email-ID?
 A:mamacademy786@gmail.com
